subpanels.description: Specimen A is an adult male Gymnura lessae, sp. nov., with a dorsal view. It measures 440 mm DW.
Specimen B is an adult female Gymnura lessae, sp. nov., with a dorsal view. It measures 695 mm DW.
Specimen C is a juvenile male Gymnura lessae, sp. nov., with a dorsal view. It measures 244 mm DW.
Specimen D is a juvenile female Gymnura lessae, sp. nov., with a dorsal view. It measures 296 mm DW.
